title: The Magic key
creator_credit: Campbell Harper Films and Scottish Central Office of Information
brief_description: Describes the progress of industrial research in Scotland and shows how better methods of technology have affected every sphere of life. Scientists and research workers have collaborated with the Scottish Council of Development and Industry to perfect new ideas and techniques, and to produce improved commodities. Their work has already resulted in a contribution to the country’s export drive and an enrichment of the daily life of the people.
